mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL ='N'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_SUBJECT, B.MEMBER_NO , B.TOWN_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME,
( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CL.COMMENT_NO) FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN "COMMENT_LIKE" CL ON CL.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ) AS COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT BT.TOWN_NAME FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO) AS TOWN_NAME,
(SELECT BC.CITY_NAME FROM "BOARD_CITY" BC WHERE BC.CITY_NO = ( SELECT BT.CITY_NO FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO )) AS CITY_NAME, (SELECT BC.CITY_NO FROM "BOARD_CITY" BC WHERE BC.CITY_NO = ( SELECT BT.CITY_NO
FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO)) AS CITY_NO, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_SUBJECT, B.MEMBER_NO , B.TOWN_NO,
( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CL.COMMENT_NO) FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN "COMMENT_LIKE" CL ON CL.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ) AS COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT BT.TOWN_NAME FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO) AS TOWN_NAME,
(SELECT BC.CITY_NAME FROM "BOARD_CITY" BC WHERE BC.CITY_NO = ( SELECT BT.CITY_NO FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO )) AS CITY_NAME, (SELECT BC.CITY_NO FROM "BOARD_CITY" BC WHERE BC.CITY_NO = ( SELECT BT.CITY_NO
FROM "BOARD_TOWN" BT WHERE BT.TOWN_NO = B.TOWN_NO)) AS CITY_NO, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN BOARD_TOWN BT ON B.TOWN_NO = BT.TOWN_NO JOIN BOARD_CITY CT ON BT.CITY_NO = CT.CITY_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject}
AND BT.TOWN_NO = #{townNo}
AND CT.CITY_NO = #{cityNo}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(BOARD_CONTENT, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR REGEXP_REPLACE(BOARD_CONTENT, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM ( SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS COMMENT_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_IMG, COMMENT_PARENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.COMMENT_PARENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ) START WITH COMMENT_PARENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = COMMENT_PARENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE "BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
